Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic

Interface PureLibSettings.WellKnownSchema

Enclosing class:
PureLibSettings
public static interface PureLibSettings.WellKnownSchema

This interface describes well-known factories in the Pure Library. All the factories are accessible via standard Java SPI service

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
SPI Service loader

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getDescription()
    Get schema description for the given SPI service
    java.lang.Class<?> getFactoryClass()
    Get factory class for the given SPI service
    java.lang.String getSchemaName()
    Get schema name, that is supported with the given service
    <T> T newInstance​(java.net.URI description)
    Create service instance by it's URI.
    boolean supportsSpiService()
    Does the class supports SpiService interface

  • Method Details

    • getSchemaName

      java.lang.String getSchemaName()

      Get schema name, that is supported with the given service

      Returns:
      schema name. Can't be null or empty

    • getDescription

      java.lang.String getDescription()

      Get schema description for the given SPI service

      Returns:
      schema description. Can be null or empty

    • getFactoryClass

      java.lang.Class<?> getFactoryClass()

      Get factory class for the given SPI service

      Returns:
      factory class for schema. Can't be null

    • supportsSpiService

      boolean supportsSpiService()

      Does the class supports SpiService interface

      Returns:
      true if yes

    • newInstance

      <T> T newInstance​(java.net.URI description) throws EnvironmentException

      Create service instance by it's URI.

      Type Parameters:
      T - service instance to create
      Parameters:
      description - uri to pass to service factory
      Returns:
      instance created
      Throws:
      EnvironmentException - on creation errors
